product_name: Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Veggies Mix - 4 oz.
long_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Veggies mix combines freeze-dried corn and peas, air-dried carrots and bell peppers, and dehydrated tomatoes for a tasty snack. Can be eaten right out of the package or added to your soups, rice or egg dishes; also makes a great topping for salads and baked potatoes. Contents of the pouch are equivalent to approximately 1.25 lbs. of fresh mixed vegetables. Resealable package keeps the vegetables crisp. Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Veggies mix has no additives, preservatives or sweeteners; naturally gluten, dairy, wheat and nut free. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Just Tomatoes, Etc.! Just Veggies mix combines freeze-dried corn and peas, air-dried carrots and bell peppers, and dehydrated tomatoes for a tasty snack.
